E

EventBinding - Class in org.zkoss.cdi.annotation.impl
An abstract class used while publishing ZK events using CDI event notification mechanism
EventBinding() - Constructor for class org.zkoss.cdi.annotation.impl.EventBinding
 
Events - Annotation Type in org.zkoss.cdi.event
Used as method parameter annotation along with @Observes The value indicates observed event in the form of target component and event name for eg. for a onClick event of a button component with id myButton Events annotation can be used in following manner public void sayHello(@Observes @Events("myButton.onClick") MouseEvent evt) { ... } Multiple events can also be specified by separating them using comma for example public void sayHello(@Observes @Events("myButton.onClick,myButton1.onClick") MouseEvent evt) { ... }
ExecutionContext - Class in org.zkoss.cdi.weld.context
Execution context for ExecutionScoped.
ExecutionContext() - Constructor for class org.zkoss.cdi.weld.context.ExecutionContext
 
ExecutionScoped - Annotation Type in org.zkoss.cdi.context
Specifies that a bean is execution scoped.

G

GenericComposer - Class in org.zkoss.cdi.util
An abstract comopser that you can extend and use JEE6 platform CDI features such as dependancy injection, custom context representing ZK scopes and use CDI notification model to write event handling methods.

JBoss Weld is the reference implementation for Contexts and Dependency Injection(JSR-299) used in Java EE 6.

org.zkoss.cdi.weld.spi - package org.zkoss.cdi.weld.spi
